# Test that a basic flow works with no deps

main .
cmp stdout stdout.golden

-- main.cue --
package test

A: {
	input:  "hello"
	output: string
}

B: {
	input:  "world"
	output: string
}
-- stdout.golden --
[detected task at "A"]
[detected task at "B"]
TASKS
  ===> A: dependencies:
  ===> B: dependencies:


PROCESSING "B"
  setting output for "B" to: "from B: world"
PROCESSING "A"
  setting output for "A" to: "from A: hello"
FILLED in B: {
	input:  "world"
	output: "from B: world"
}

FILLED in A: {
	input:  "hello"
	output: "from A: hello"
}



 === END RESULT ===
{
	A: {
		input:  "hello"
		output: "from A: hello"
	}
	B: {
		input:  "world"
		output: "from B: world"
	}
}
